tijos.framework.devicecenter

Class TiSPIMaster

  • java.lang.Object
    • tijos.framework.devicecenter.TiSPIMaster

  • public class TiSPIMaster
extends java.lang.Object
    The TiSPIMaster for devicecenter of framework.

      • setMode

        public void setMode(int workMode,
                    int baudRate,
                    int direction,
                    int io)
             throws java.io.IOException
        Set mode values, have platform dependencies
        Parameters:
        workMode - work mode[IN] workMode:0, mode0, default workMode:1, mode1 workMode:2, mode2 workMode:3, mode3
        baudRate - baud rate[IN] baudRate:1, 1Mbps, default baudRate:2, 2Mbps baudRate:3, 3Mbps baudRate:., .....
        direction - bit direction[IN] 1.MODE_MSB, default 2.MODE_LSB
        io - data io mode[IN] 1.MODE_SIO, default 2.MODE_DIO 3.MODE_QIO
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If a TiSPIMaster error occurs
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If workMode or baudRate value out of range

      • write
